title: Standing Palm-Up Wrist Stretch
description: Standing Palm-Up Wrist Stretch Equipment required Primary muscle group(s) Forearms, Wrists Stand strong, with your feet grounded and placed shoulder-width apart while maintaining a tight core and flat back. Fully extend one arm directly out in front of you and rotate it so that the palm is facing up. With your free hand, take hold of your outstretched fingertips and gently pull them down towards the floor.
